title.rendered: “Inside Look: Central Command Chief’s Response and IDF Forces’ Sweeping Action Following Jordan Valley Attack”

content.rendered:
IDF Speaker:

Following the shooting attack in the Jordan Valley and Emek Brigade this morning, the Central Command chief arrived at the scene of the attack and conducted an initial situation assessment together with the brigade commander.
IDF forces continue sweeping the area for the terrorist.

Attached are pictures on the subject: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC280320249236453

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/3IU51pV

Attached is documentation of the forces sweeping the area: https://bit.ly/4cttFv7

Attached are pictures of the forces sweeping the area: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC280320248672864
